text: Talwara is a village located in the Ludhiana West tehsil, of Ludhiana district, Punjab. ==Population== {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Particulars !! Total !! Male!!Female |- | Total No. of Houses||210|| || |- | Population ||1,056||555||501 |- |} ==Villages in Ludhiana West Tehsil== ==Air travel connectivity== The closest airport to the village is Sahnewal Airport. ==References== Category:Villages in Ludhiana West tehsil
title: Talwara (Ludhiana West)
